[{"id":"JT-49105","entityId":"25-2112727","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"49105"},{"name":"summary","value":"There is no number on Y axis for Limit value"},{"name":"description","value":"

build 45674

  1. Run YT on empty db with following parameters
-Djetbrains.youtrack.feature.enableAll=true -Djetbrains.youtrack.dangerousFeatures=true
  1. Create new project
    AR:
Request URL: http://unit-933.times.labs.intellij.net:8888/youtrack/hub/api/rest/projects/undefined?query=&fields=id%2Cname%2CmyFavorite%2Ckey%2Cdashboard%2Curl%2Cdescription%2CiconUrl%2Ctotal%2Carchived%2Cglobal%2Cresources(id%2Ckey%2Ctype%2Cname%2ChomeUrl%2Cservice(id%2Cname%2CiconUrl%2Cversion%2CapplicationName%2ChomeUrl%2Ctrusted))%2Cowner(id%2Clogin%2Cname%2Cprofile(avatar%2Cemail))%2CcreationTime%2Cteam%2Fusers(id%2Clogin%2Cprofile%2Favatar)
Request Method: GET
Status Code: 404 Not Found

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1537173453360,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-49205","entityId":"25-2118308","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"49205"},{"name":"summary","value":"Usage statistics chart needs progress bar"},{"name":"description","value":"

Sometimes chart with usage statistics appears with delay
It seems we need progress loader for the chart.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1537168491197"},{"name":"updated","value":"1537172988386"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"pavel.nikitin"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Pavel Nikitin"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"alexander.buturlinov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Buturlinov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-926","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Core Functionality"],"valueId":["Core Functionality"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Cosmetics"],"valueId":["Cosmetics"],"color":{"bg":"#b7e281","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Minor"],"valueId":["Minor"],"color":{"bg":"#e6e6e6","fg":"#888"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 75","id":"YouTrack:sprint 75"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48790","entityId":"25-2095640","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48790"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't add an Issue Distribution Report widget to a dashboard"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  • go to a dashboard on hub.jetbrains.com
  • add the widget
  • select YouTrack
  • select New Report
  • enter a name for the report (I used "TestReport")
  • select Hub as a project
  • click Save

AR:

  • An error "Cannot save report: Property FlatDistributionReport.name is invalid" is shown
  • The json of the POST request doesn't include required data
{"$type":"jetbrains.youtrack.reports.impl.distribution.flat.gap.FlatDistributionReport","name":"","projects":[],"xsortOrder":"COUNT_INDEX_DESC","xaxis":{"field":{"$type":"jetbrains.charisma.keyword.PredefinedFilterField","id":"project","presentation":"project"}},"query":"","own":true}

ER: widget configuration ends successfully
